question: Batteries are made up of smaller parts, known as cells, which store mechanical energy - (Chemical Energy)
A cell is a single unit device which converts chemical energy into electrical energy.
A battery stores chemical energy which can be converted to electrical energy to provide power in our homes, schools, shops and factories.
An electrical circuit is a closed-loop device that provides a path for the flow of electrical current
Some rules for using electricity safely include using your wet hands before you plug in or unplug a cord - (Dry hands)
